restrictionByCondition.condition: OutletStatusHistory FROM InformationRegister.OutletStatusHistory AS OutletStatusHistory INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON OutletStatusHistory.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Distributor FROM Catalog.Distributor AS Distributor LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions ON Distributor.Regions.Region = ManagersOfRegions.Region WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser AND TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Distributors) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Read = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)

AccountReceivable FROM Document.AccountReceivable AS AccountReceivable INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON AccountReceivable.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_AccountReceivable") AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Orders FROM Document.Order AS Orders INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Orders.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Order") AND Orders.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Region WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Regions") AND Region.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Outlets FROM Catalog.Outlet AS Outlets INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Outlets.Ref = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Outlets") AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Visit FROM Document.Visit AS Visit INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Visit.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Visit") AND Visit.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

MobileAppPlanVisit FROM Document.MobileAppPlanVisit AS MobileAppPlanVisit INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON MobileAppPlanVisit.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE MobileAppPlanVisit.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Returns FROM Document.Return AS Returns INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Returns.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Return") AND Returns.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Territory WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Territories") AND Territory.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

Encashment WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Encashment") AND Encashment.Visit IN (SELECT Visit.Ref FROM Document.Visit AS Visit INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Visit.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE Visit.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

Task FROM Document.Task AS Task INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON Task.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Task") AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)

AssortmentMatrix WHERE #HaveRightToEdit("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_AssortmentMatrix") AND AssortmentMatrix.Responsible IN (SELECT RegionManagers.Manager FROM Catalog.Region.Managers AS RegionManagers WHERE RegionManagers.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

Questionnaire WHERE #HaveRightToEdit("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Questionnaire") AND Questionnaire.Owner IN (SELECT RegionManagers.Manager FROM Catalog.Region.Managers AS RegionManagers WHERE RegionManagers.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

VisitPlan WHERE TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_VisitPlan) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Read = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser) AND VisitPlan.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

User WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Users") AND (User.Ref IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)) OR User.Ref IN (SELECT RegionManagers.Manager FROM Catalog.Region.Managers AS RegionManagers WHERE RegionManagers.Ref IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser)))

QuestioningResults FROM InformationRegister.QuestioningResults AS QuestioningResults INNER JOIN Catalog.Territory.Outlets AS TerritoryOutlets ON QuestioningResults.Outlet = TerritoryOutlets.Outlet WHERE #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Visit") AND #HaveRightToRead("Catalog.SystemObjects.Document_Questionnaire") AND TerritoryOutlets.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser) AND QuestioningResults.SR IN (SELECT TerritorySRs.SR FROM Catalog.Territory.SRs AS TerritorySRs WHERE TerritorySRs.Ref.Owner IN (SELECT ManagersOfRegions.Region FROM InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions WHERE ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser))

Contractors FROM Catalog.Contractors AS Contractors LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.ManagersOfRegions AS ManagersOfRegions ON Contractors.Regions.Region = ManagersOfRegions.Region WHERE TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(Catalog.SystemObjects.Catalog_Contractors) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Read = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser) AND ManagersOfRegions.Manager = &CurrentUser

restrictionTemplate.name: HaveRightToEdit
restrictionTemplate.condition:
CASE WHEN DeletionMark = Ref.DeletionMark THEN
TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(#Параметр(1)) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Edit = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)
ELSE
TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(#Параметр(1)) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.MarkForDeletion = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)
END

restrictionTemplate.name: HaveRightToRead
restrictionTemplate.condition: TRUE IN (SELECT TOP 1 TRUE FROM Catalog.User AS User INNER JOIN Catalog.RolesOfUsers.AccessRightsToSystemObjects AS RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects ON User.RoleOfUser = RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Ref WHERE RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.SystemObject = VALUE(#Параметр(1)) AND RolesOfUsersAccessRightsToSystemObjects.Read = TRUE AND User.Ref = &CurrentUser)
